Title: Requires oil companies to clean up any spillage occurring during oil delivery
Summary: Requires oil companies to clean up any spillage occurring during oil delivery within 24 hours and imposes a fine of $500 for the first offense with $1000 for each additional offense.
LawCode: Add ยง309, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring oil companies to clean up spillage occurring during a delivery
